title: Number of Dollar Tree stores in Canada by province 2019
summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Province, and Number of stores in each Province on the y axis.
The maximum Number of stores 110.0 is found at Province Ontario and the minimum is found at Manitoba where Number of stores is 13.0.
The difference of Number of stores between the highest and lowest Province is 97.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Province in the x axis and Number of stores in the y axis.
The Number of stores is highest at Province Ontario and lowest at Province Manitoba.
